
                            
                            <p> <br>  <br> 我爸最终还是选择做手术了。刚刚进去做手术了，医生出来和我说，一条堵塞了，另外一条风险很高。现在看看能不能把堵塞这条弄好。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1008.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1008.gif"> </p>
